body_html: Can you try reducing your learning rate? If your original optimization was close to being numerically unstable, then a small numerical change in the upgrade could cause training to diverge consistently.
body_text: Can you try reducing your learning rate? If your original optimization was close to being numerically unstable, then a small numerical change in the upgrade could cause training to diverge consistently.
body: Can you try reducing your learning rate? If your original optimization was close to being numerically unstable, then a small numerical change in the upgrade could cause training to diverge consistently.
